titleStmt.title: The new Irish Christmass box or, The female dear Joy trick'd ont [sic] of her maiden head. To an excellent new Teagueland tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B. Deacon, at the Angel in Guilt-spur-Street without New-Gate,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of suggested by H.R. Plomer.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
